titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident of Bushire, Writing from Bombay, to the Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, states that in recent years the allowance granted to him for the keeping of a public table at the Residency has not been sufficient, because of the increase in the number of visitors to Bushire. Bruce requests remuneration from the month of November 1816 onwards and he expresses his hope that an additional allowance will be granted for the future.
